org.qualitune.naoservice.client
Class NaoUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.qualitune.naoservice.client.NaoUtil

public class NaoUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides further utility methods for the Nao class that cannot be generated from the NaoQi API (i.e., more complex requests).

Author:
Claas Wilke

getActuatorSummary

public static java.lang.String getActuatorSummary(NaoData nao)
                                           throws NaoUtilException
Reaturns a summary of all motors within the Nao, their stiffness and current position as a String.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao whose summary shall be returned.
Returns:
The summary as a String.
Throws:
NaoUtilException - Thrown, if accessing the summary fails.

getAvgStiffness

public static float getAvgStiffness(NaoData nao)
Returns the average stiffness of all motors to a given Nao.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao whose stiffness shall be returned.
Returns:
The average stiffness of all motors. 0.0 means all motors have not stiffness. 1.0 means all motors have full stiffness.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

getSensorValue

public static java.lang.String getSensorValue(NaoData nao,
                                              java.lang.String identifier)
                                       throws NaoUtilException
Returns the values as a Strings for a given String as a sensor identifier.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao to read the value.
identifier - The sensor identifier as a String.
Returns:
The value as a String.
Throws:
NaoUtilException - Thrown, if the sensor value request fails.

                                                                               java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> identifier)
                                                                        throws NaoUtilException
Returns a Map of values as Strings for a given List of sensor identifiers.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao to read the values.
identifier - The sensor identifiers as a List.
Returns:
The values as a Map.
Throws:
NaoUtilException - Thrown if the request fails.

getSensorValueIDs

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSensorValueIDs(NaoData nao)
                                                          throws NaoUtilException
Returns the identifiers of all sensors that can be requested from a Nao via the method NaoUtil#getSensorValue(Nao, String).

Throws:
NaoUtilException - Thrown, if the request fails.

say

public static boolean say(NaoData nao,
                          java.lang.String text)
Lets the given Nao say the given text.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao that shall say the text.
text - The text to be said.
Returns:
true if executed successfully.

say

public static boolean say(NaoData nao,
                          java.lang.String text,
                          SayParameter... parameters)
Lets the given Nao say the given text. The text will be encoded to avoid errors with special characters. The web service on the nao then decodes it.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao that shall say the text.
text - The Nao that shall say the text.
parameters - a set of SayParameters for passing parameters to adjust the voice of the nao.
Returns:
true if executed successfully.

setStiffness

public static boolean setStiffness(NaoData nao,
                                   float stiffness)
Sets the stiffness of all motors to a given value.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao whose stiffness shall be set.
stiffness - The stiffness (0.0 = no stiffness, 1.0 = full stiffness).
Returns:
True, if the stiffness has been set successfully.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

sitDown

public static boolean sitDown(NaoData nao)
Lets the given Nao stand up, if the SitDown behavior is deployed on the Nao.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao that shall sit down.
Returns:
true if the behavior has been executed successfully.

startProfilingOfSensors

public static java.lang.String startProfilingOfSensors(NaoData nao,
                                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> ids,
                                                       int profilingInterval)
Starts a profiling thread to continuously profile some sensors of the Nao.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao to be profiled.
ids - The IDs of the sensors to be profiled.
profilingInterval - The profiling interval in milliseconds.
Returns:
A session ID to handle this profiling thread. TODO Test me TODO check arguments

stopProfilingOfSensors

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Double,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> stopProfilingOfSensors(NaoData nao,
                                                                                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> ids,
                                                                                                      java.lang.String sessionID)
Stops the profiling of a set of Nao sensors for a given session id.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao that is currently profiled.
ids - The IDs of the sensors to be profiled.
sessionID - The session ID for the profiling to be stopped. TODO Test me TODO check arguments

walkTo

public static boolean walkTo(NaoData nao,
                             float xDistance,
                             float yDistance)
Lets the given Nao walk a given distance.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao.
xDistance - The distance to be walked to the front (negative value means backwards) in meters.
yDistance - The distance to be walked to the side (positive means: right, negative means: left) in meters.
Returns:
true if method invocation was successful.

waveHello

public static boolean waveHello(NaoData nao)
Lets the given Nao waves hello with its right arm, if the Hello behavior is deployed on the Nao.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao that shall play the behavior.
Returns:
true if the behavior has been executed successfully.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao that shall play the behavior.
Returns:
true if the behavior has been executed successfully.

runBehavior

public static boolean runBehavior(NaoData nao,
                                  java.lang.String behavior)
Executes a behavior on a given Nao.

Parameters:
nao - The Nao where the behavior shall be executed.
behavior - The identifier of an behavior that must be installed on the Nao.
Returns:
true if the behavior has been executed successfully.
